text: Blind Man's Bluff is an oil painting by Jean-Honoré Fragonard. It was painted in 1755-1756. It measures 46 x 36 in. It hangs in the Toledo Museum of Art. It is the companion piece to The See-Saw. == References == * Category:1750s paintings Category:Paintings by Jean-Honoré Fragonard
title: Blind Man's Bluff
